dublinCore.dc:title: 115 S1353 IS: To extend the authority for modifications to the Second Division Memorial in the District of Columbia.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Murkowski introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the authority for modifications to the Second Division Memorial in the District of Columbia.

section.header: Extension of authority for modifications to Second Division Memorial
section.text: Notwithstanding section 8903(e) of title 40, United States Code, the authority provided by section 352 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115â€“91; 131 Stat. 1367) shall continue to apply through September 30, 2032.
